attributes.review: 🏃‍♀️Upon opening this app from our Cheeto ruler, 😔 I was immediately sent into a cardiac arrest. 👁👅👁 My heart could not handle the sight 👁 of such a horrendous,🤢 round, 🤮and orange 🍊 man. 😔✌️💔Thanks a lot bunker boy😤✋ I am currently typing 😗😳this on my death bed😤🤪🙈. Let me know if you guys want me to say hello to jah for y’all 😗✌️
attributes.title: HORRID  👁👄✌️

attributes.review: App really made my phone slow or stop working for 5-10 minutes at a time when it did work after downloading the app.
attributes.title: Broke my phone

attributes.review: This app was so hard to get in to it took at least 3 days to get in it was lagging a lot and too many ads. Also it kept on kicking me out. I can’t believe I wasted MY time to go and support an orange.
attributes.title: Worst app ever made!!

attributes.review: Trump wants to take my phone number right when I open the app for the first time. He wants to ban TikTok for stealing information and selling it so why would I want to allow him to do that. Unbelievable.
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app I’ve ever downloaded in my whole life. It caused my phone to crash, it glitches, and it took hours to download. I definitely do NOT recommend downloading. -15/10.
attributes.title: Don’t download.

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash so bad. It was very glitchy and had very poor quality. I was very disappointed in how low the quality was with this app. I no longer support Trump.
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded to see if it could make America great again but it turns out that America was never great to begin with and this app just makes it more racist... 1 star do not recommend
attributes.title: It doesn’t work

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and realized oh no! Our president is a racist, child molester, and homophobic! Voting for him is not a good idea. I don’t care what he did or didn’t do for our economy, I’d rather not have a terrible human being in office and running our country.
attributes.title: Oh no!

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever seen in my whole entire life. This app caused me to stick a toothpick in between my toe nail and kick a wall because of how horrible it is!! I do not recommend downloading this app!!! 🤬 Very bad -10/10
attributes.title: Do not download!!

attributes.review: I was a girl in the Village doing all right into I downloaded this last night.  Horrible app it was horrible when got onto the app my phone started too glitch and I would work
attributes.title: Horrible app
